table.name: actor_info
table.viewSql: SELECT a.actor_id, a.first_name, a.last_name, group_concat(DISTINCT (((c.name)::text || ': '::text) || ( SELECT group_concat((f.title)::text) AS group_concat FROM ((film f JOIN film_category fc_1 ON ((f.film_id = fc_1.film_id))) JOIN film_actor fa_1 ON ((f.film_id = fa_1.film_id))) WHERE ((fc_1.category_id = c.category_id) AND (fa_1.actor_id = a.actor_id)) GROUP BY fa_1.actor_id))) AS film_info FROM (((actor a LEFT JOIN film_actor fa ON ((a.actor_id = fa.actor_id))) LEFT JOIN film_category fc ON ((fa.film_id = fc.film_id))) LEFT JOIN category c ON ((fc.category_id = c.category_id))) GROUP BY a.actor_id, a.first_name, a.last_name;

table.name: customer_list
table.viewSql: SELECT cu.customer_id AS id, (((cu.first_name)::text || ' '::text) || (cu.last_name)::text) AS name, a.address, a.postal_code AS "zip code", a.phone, city.city, country.country, CASE WHEN cu.activebool THEN 'active'::text ELSE ''::text END AS notes, cu.store_id AS sid FROM (((customer cu JOIN address a ON ((cu.address_id = a.address_id))) JOIN city ON ((a.city_id = city.city_id))) JOIN country ON ((city.country_id = country.country_id)));

table.name: film_list
table.viewSql: SELECT film.film_id AS fid, film.title, film.description, category.name AS category, film.rental_rate AS price, film.length, film.rating, group_concat((((actor.first_name)::text || ' '::text) || (actor.last_name)::text)) AS actors FROM ((((category LEFT JOIN film_category ON ((category.category_id = film_category.category_id))) LEFT JOIN film ON ((film_category.film_id = film.film_id))) JOIN film_actor ON ((film.film_id = film_actor.film_id))) JOIN actor ON ((film_actor.actor_id = actor.actor_id))) GROUP BY film.film_id, film.title, film.description, category.name, film.rental_rate, film.length, film.rating;

table.name: nicer_but_slower_film_list
table.viewSql: SELECT film.film_id AS fid, film.title, film.description, category.name AS category, film.rental_rate AS price, film.length, film.rating, group_concat((((upper("substring"((actor.first_name)::text, 1, 1)) || lower("substring"((actor.first_name)::text, 2))) || upper("substring"((actor.last_name)::text, 1, 1))) || lower("substring"((actor.last_name)::text, 2)))) AS actors FROM ((((category LEFT JOIN film_category ON ((category.category_id = film_category.category_id))) LEFT JOIN film ON ((film_category.film_id = film.film_id))) JOIN film_actor ON ((film.film_id = film_actor.film_id))) JOIN actor ON ((film_actor.actor_id = actor.actor_id))) GROUP BY film.film_id, film.title, film.description, category.name, film.rental_rate, film.length, film.rating;

checkConstraint.constraint: (((payment_date >= '2007-01-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone) AND (payment_date < '2007-02-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone)))
checkConstraint.name: payment_p2007_01_payment_date_check

checkConstraint.constraint: (((payment_date >= '2007-02-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone) AND (payment_date < '2007-03-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone)))
checkConstraint.name: payment_p2007_02_payment_date_check

checkConstraint.constraint: (((payment_date >= '2007-03-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone) AND (payment_date < '2007-04-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone)))
checkConstraint.name: payment_p2007_03_payment_date_check

checkConstraint.constraint: (((payment_date >= '2007-04-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone) AND (payment_date < '2007-05-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone)))
checkConstraint.name: payment_p2007_04_payment_date_check

checkConstraint.constraint: (((payment_date >= '2007-05-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone) AND (payment_date < '2007-06-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone)))
checkConstraint.name: payment_p2007_05_payment_date_check

checkConstraint.constraint: (((payment_date >= '2007-06-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone) AND (payment_date < '2007-07-01 00:00:00'::timestamp without time zone)))
checkConstraint.name: payment_p2007_06_payment_date_check

table.name: sales_by_film_category
table.viewSql: SELECT c.name AS category, sum(p.amount) AS total_sales FROM (((((payment p JOIN rental r ON ((p.rental_id = r.rental_id))) JOIN inventory i ON ((r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id))) JOIN film f ON ((i.film_id = f.film_id))) JOIN film_category fc ON ((f.film_id = fc.film_id))) JOIN category c ON ((fc.category_id = c.category_id))) GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY (sum(p.amount)) DESC;

table.name: sales_by_store
table.viewSql: SELECT (((c.city)::text || ','::text) || (cy.country)::text) AS store, (((m.first_name)::text || ' '::text) || (m.last_name)::text) AS manager, sum(p.amount) AS total_sales FROM (((((((payment p JOIN rental r ON ((p.rental_id = r.rental_id))) JOIN inventory i ON ((r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id))) JOIN store s ON ((i.store_id = s.store_id))) JOIN address a ON ((s.address_id = a.address_id))) JOIN city c ON ((a.city_id = c.city_id))) JOIN country cy ON ((c.country_id = cy.country_id))) JOIN staff m ON ((s.manager_staff_id = m.staff_id))) GROUP BY cy.country, c.city, s.store_id, m.first_name, m.last_name ORDER BY cy.country, c.city;

table.name: staff_list
table.viewSql: SELECT s.staff_id AS id, (((s.first_name)::text || ' '::text) || (s.last_name)::text) AS name, a.address, a.postal_code AS "zip code", a.phone, city.city, country.country, s.store_id AS sid FROM (((staff s JOIN address a ON ((s.address_id = a.address_id))) JOIN city ON ((a.city_id = city.city_id))) JOIN country ON ((city.country_id = country.country_id)));

routine.name: _group_concat(text, text)
routine.definition: SELECT CASE WHEN $2 IS NULL THEN $1 WHEN $1 IS NULL THEN $2 ELSE $1 || ', ' || $2 END

routine.name: add_to_inventory(integer, integer)
routine.definition: INSERT INTO inventory (film_id, store_id) VALUES (in_film_id, in_store_id);

routine.name: film_in_stock(integer, integer)
routine.definition: SELECT inventory_id FROM inventory WHERE film_id = $1 AND store_id = $2 AND inventory_in_stock(inventory_id);

routine.name: film_not_in_stock(integer, integer)
routine.definition: SELECT inventory_id FROM inventory WHERE film_id = $1 AND store_id = $2 AND NOT inventory_in_stock(inventory_id);

routine.name: get_customer_balance(integer, timestamp without time zone)
inventory_held_by_customer(integer)
inventory_in_stock(integer)
last_day(timestamp without time zone)
routine.definition: SELECT CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM $1) = 12 THEN (((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM $1) + 1) operator(pg_catalog.||) '-01-01')::date - INTERVAL '1 day')::date ELSE ((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM $1) operator(pg_catalog.||) '-' operator(pg_catalog.||) (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM $1) + 1) operator(pg_catalog.||) '-01')::date - INTERVAL '1 day')::date END

routine.name: last_updated()
rewards_report(integer, numeric)
